text: Þis synt þa land gemæro to melebroce.

Ærest of hreodbrycge andlang stræte on fearninga broce andlang mearce on melebroces ford east andlang mearce on þunres lea norþeweardne þonon andlang weges on cinges dic þonon andlang mearce on holan weg of þam wege on þa ea oþ midne stream andlang streames on hreodbrycge.
And se haga an ham tune þe þærto gebyret.
Þis is þara VII hida boc æt Melebroce þe Eadwig cing gebocode Wulfrice his þegne on ece yrfe.
